name: Nausi-tical
description:
You’re a sailor who moves cargo around on ships, easy job, except… you get terribly seasick!

Controls - Keyboard:

Mouse - Aim
WASD - Move
Left Click - Pickup Boxes
Backspace/Enter - Pause

Controls - Gamepad(Mouse still needed for menus):

Right Stick - Aim
Left Stick - Move
Left Trigger - Pickup Boxes
Start Button - Pause(Mouse for menus)
